message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to invest in this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would you consider reducing the price to $10000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $11500.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still looking to keep my investment within my specified budget. Would you be able to lower the price to $11000?
Hi Bob, I understand your persistence in keeping your investment within budget. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $11250.
